config.show-button.name: Show Button
config.show-button.description: Whether to show the 'Send All' button on chest menus.
config.keybind.name: Send All Keybind
config.keybind.description: Keybind to send all items to the chest.
config.manual-lock.name: Manual Slot Locking
config.manual-lock.description: Enable manual slot locking when Convenient Inventory is not installed.
config.locked-slots.name: Locked Slots
config.locked-slots.description: List of slots to lock separated by commas (e.g: 0,1,5,12). Slots range from 0 to 35.
